recipe.title: Easy Chocolate Cake
recipe.subtitle: Easy to make chocolate cake
recipe.ingredients: 1/2 C Boiling water 1/2 C Cocoa 170 g Butter 1 1/2 C Castor Sugar 3 Eggs, beaten 1 tsp Vanilla 2 C Self-raising Flour Pinch of Salt 1/4 tsp Baking Soda 3/4 C Milk
recipe.steps: Blend Cocoa and Water and Cool. Cream Butter and Sugar, Beat in Vanilla and Eggs gradually. Mix in cool cocoa mixture. Sift in Flour, Salt and Baking Soda. Fold into creamed mixture. Alternatly fold with milk. Spoon into greased ring tin. Cook at 180C
